text.content: â€œLight is a one-stop solution to collaborate on your team's knowledge, projects, and data. We offer Tasks, Projects, Notes, Wiki, Files, Spreadsheets, and Databases. We will tightly integrate personal productivity (to-dos and notes) with team collaboration.â€
